name: Deios II // DEIDIA
description: [WELCOME]ALT.DIETYNETDeidia is an exploration glitch-venture game where you explore a lonely unstable world, with glitches, forgotten ruins, and unknown lands abandoned in lonely BBS systems. Corrupt the world to find new paths.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, or 10 Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, or 10 Processor: 2GHz+ Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB+
